author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
Current tests are for specific bug fixes in `test/powershell/Host/TabCompletion/BugFix.Tests.ps1`

We should have proper `TabCompletion.Tests.ps1` that replaces this file with proper test titles.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: I believe we should transform the file in _full completion test set_ - currently we don't cover the code by tests.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @daxian-dbw added a bunch of tests, consider this resolved.

title: clean-up existing tab completion tests, add more coverage
